PHRASE.LANG: Frank Zappa wore this Rental shirt in 1968. Two years before, Zappa, with his Mothers of Invention, had released the sonically peerless debut, Freak Out!, the first concept album in rock and roll and it's first double lp. [#Legal]

Frank Zappa portait ce t-shirt Rental en 1968. Deux ans plus tôt, Zappa et son groupe Mothers of Invention sortaient leur premier album : Freak Out!, premier album-concept et premier double album de l'histoire du rock. [#Legal]

1968 trug Frank Zappa dieses „Rental“-T-Shirt. Zwei Jahre zuvor hatte Zappa mit den Mothers of Invention das klanglich einzigartige Debütalbum „Freak Out!“ veröffentlicht. Dabei handelt es sich um das erste Konzept- und das erste Doppelalbum in der Geschichte der Rockmusik. [#Legal]

Frank Zappa indossò questa maglia Rental nel 1968. Due anni prima, Zappa ed il suo gruppo, Mothers of Invention, debuttarono con l'impeccabile Freak Out!, il primo concept album del rock e il suo primo doppio LP. [#Legal]

Frank Zappa llevó la camiseta Rental en 1968. Dos años antes, The Mothers of Invention marcó el debut sonoro sin igual de Zappa con Freak Out!, el primer álbum conceptual de rock and roll y su primer doble LP. [#Legal]
